    index="my-index-000001",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "my_english_analyzer": {
                    "type": "standard",
                    "max_token_length": 5,
                    "stopwords": "_english_"

            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
